conversion_verification.notes: Successful isometric cutaway rendering with consistent geometry.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent wall height and thickness. Perfect isometric viewing angle and clean cutaway geometry.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity to floor plan. Room adjacencies and wall positions are highly accurate. Minor simplification of window frames.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement matches the original 2D layout very closely, including kitchen and bathroom fixtures.

visual_clarity.notes: Extremely clean render with no text contamination. Clear distinction between structural materials.

detected_errors.description: Visual simplification of window glazing in some exterior sections compared to detailed 2D plan.

summary: The 3D conversion is an exceptionally faithful and geometrically accurate isometric reconstruction of the provided 20-room-layout floor plan.
